parameters.name: test1
parameters.description: First dimension. Is made up of two parts: the stimulus type (consonants or numbers) and the modality (-a, -v, or -av) or 'none' (not in quotes).  I.e., consonants-a for auditory consonants.

parameters.name: test2
parameters.description: Secondary nback dimension. either squares or none (which is a single-d n-back)

parameters.name: dim1targs
parameters.description: In each block, how many targets match only on dimension-1

parameters.name: dim2targs
parameters.description: In each block, how many targets match only on dimension-2

parameters.name: bothtargs
parameters.description: In each block, how many targets match both d1 and d2

parameters.name: trialsperblock
parameters.description: Total trials per block.  Should be greater than sum of dim1targs,dim2targs, and bothtargs.
